attributes.action: Without a 66% majority public confirmatory vote on any Brexit, revoke A50.
attributes.background: The public were asked to start this in 2016 and should have the final decision on it. As the country has been divided over the past 3 years then any option should command two thirds of the vote to be the clear choice. Anything less than that should result in revocation of Article 50 and remain.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure in what circumstances you would like a referendum held and what the options for it would be.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245856
